name: Minus 7
description: Minus7 is a new space heating and hot water technology based on an ambient collector (a roof) and heat pump.  With years of experience spent refining and improving its technology, Minus7 has successfully integrated it's technology into new and existing residential developments.  There are no ugly bolt-ons and no need to face due south - just space heating and 44°C hot water on tap.  As winner of the South East Renewable Energy Award 2005 and MCS certified as a Solar Thermal Product, Minus7 has a seasonally adjusted COP of above 4 - the best in the market.
